name: The Game Before the Gate
desc:
A soldier-entity born into being through the skills of various members of the Hexenzirkel.
Although their technological underpinnings are far from abstruse, and touch not upon the profound wisdom at the universe's core, yet as guards of the gate's final threshold, they are a metaphor in and of themselves.
This world may be governed by rules, but for those who manage to cross its verge, such constraints no longer apply.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Ascended Sample: Knight
dropMaterial.desc:
A rare sample resulting from the alchemical activation of a substance.
In the esoteric codices, the bronze knight knows not whether its mission is to conquer or to protect. Since its alchemical elevation, it has merely been seeking to discover its purpose. The age of bronze was an age of heroes.

dropMaterial.name: Ascended Sample: Rook
dropMaterial.desc:
A rare sample resulting from the alchemical activation of a substance.
The name of this piece derives from the word for the "Chariot" in the ancient language of Sumeru. In divination, the Chariot card is depicted with two heavenly steeds — one black and one white — symbolizing the alchemical principle of balancing opposing properties.

dropMaterial.name: Ascended Sample: Queen
dropMaterial.desc:
A rare sample resulting from the alchemical activation of a substance.
The "Queen" was once known as the "Minister," but as the rules of the game evolved, it grew to become the most powerful piece and a representation of the authority of the family behind the throne — a true symbol of gilded royalty.
Perhaps the promotion of an ordinary foot soldier shares some similarities with the transmutation of matter, yet even should they manage to turn to gold, the most a pawn might hope for is to be represented by an upturned rook.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

dropMaterial.name: Dream Solvent
dropMaterial.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Sword Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Bow Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>"Deep Blue"</color>
Solve all the puzzles in the chess game.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text: New Boss - "The Game Before the Gate"

<color=#ffd780>May 6, 2025</color>
Hello, Traveler!
After the Version 5.6 update, you will encounter a new boss "The Game Before the Gate." Let's check out what special traits it has and how to deal with it~
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/38627459</color>
